description: For a picnic-perfect classic salad, try our Caesar salad recipe - it's the only one you'll ever need.
name: Caesar Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place lettuce, croutons and bacon in a large bowl. Add a little dressing and toss to combine. Shave parmesan over salad and serve with remaining dressing.
